name: Anuj Agrawal
about: Student at Indian Institute of Technology Bombay with great enthusiasm in innovative technologies which has the potential to become the next multi-billion dollar idea.

experience.title: Web and Tech Head
experience.description: Working in a team of 24 towards conceptualizing the 50th edition of Mood Indigo, 2020. Mood Indigo is Asia's Largest college cultural fest with a footfall of 1,43,000 and 230+ events executed over 4 days.Leading a 2-tier team to Ideate and execute digital solutions for the festival. Using Data Science to increase the reach and popularity of the organization. Working towards making the fest fully digitalized with innovative solutions and state-of-the-art technologies.
